content: संक्षेपः {@--1@} Throwing together. {@--2@} Compression, abridgment. {@--3@} Brevity, conciseness. {@--4@} An epitome, a brief exposition. {@--5@} Throwing, sending. {@--6@} Taking away. {@--7@} Assisting in another's duty. (संक्षेपेण, संक्षेपतस् are used adverbially in the sense of ‘briefly, concisely, shortly’).
